marginalia.anchor_text: Castilio the maker, whan he was in this realme to be installed knight of the Order for the Duke his Maister

position.marginalia_text: Castilio installid knight off the order, for the Duke his master.

underline.text: The honour and entertainment that your noble Auncestours shewed Castilio the maker, whan he was in this realme to be installed knight of the Order for the Duke his Maister, was not so muche as presently both he, and this his handywoorke shall receiue of you
